VendorProject.name: VendorProject
VendorProject.description: Represents information about a vendor's proejct for which the loan was applied.

ApprovalStatus.description: The financial institutes approval status for the vendor project.

ApproverId.description: The User associated with the vendor project. The user is from the financial institute that approves the project.

EndDate.description: The scheduled end date of the vendor project.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

LocationId.description: The Location associated with the vendor project.

Name.description: The name of the vendor's project.

OwnerId.description: ID of the user who created the record.

PhoneNumber.description: The phone number of the project's representative. For example, the phone number of project manager or site lead.

Price.description: The price of the vendor project.

Stage.description: The current stage of this project.

StartDate.description: The start date of the vendor project.

VendorId.description: The account associated with the vendor project for which the loan was applied.

VendorProjectContact.description: The name of the project representative.
